item.title: Marvel Rivals Trick Can Give Winter Soldier Players a Serious Advantage
item.description:
Summary

  • Winter Soldier charges ult by hitting Loki's clones, increasing his viability.
  • Winter Soldier's Kraken Impact has a powerful reset ability.
  • Discoveries like Mantis charging healing from clones exist in Marvel Rivals.

A Marvel Rivals player has discovered that the Winter Soldier can charge his ultimate by hitting Loki's clones. Although he's not among the strongest Marvel Rivals Strategists, like Jeff the Land Shark and Luna Snow, Thor's brother has an ability that has quickly gained popularity among players.

The Winter Soldier is one of the Marvel Rivals ' combo-based Duelists who offers consistent and burst damage. Although he has low mobility and is dependent on playing around a Vanguard, Bucky Barnes has a powerful weapon in his Ultimate, Kraken Impact. To play Marvel Rivals as the Winter Soldier, mastering when to use Bucky Barnes' ultimate is essential. The reason lies in the Kraken Impact's special property, which resets the cooldown immediately when an opponent is killed by it.

Redditor xdman9765 discovered that hitting Loki's clones helps the Winter Soldier charge his ult. To demonstrate their discovery, they share a clip from one of their matches in which Captain America's best friend uses Kraken Impact on Loki's clone, and to their surprise, the ability doesn't go into cooldown. That is possible because one of Loki's powers in Marvel Rivals is Deception, which creates an illusion and makes the god of mischief invisible. With Doppelganger the player creates an illusion that can use some of his abilities. But while the abilities are fun for tricking enemies, they can backfire if used against certain heroes.

Loki's Other Interactions With the Heroes of Marvel Rivals

The comments section was surprised by the discovery, but some Redditors noted that this isn't the only interaction of this kind that exists in the shooter. One of the players said that Mantis can charge her healing faster by hitting the clones with headshots. Another member of the community said that Wolverine charges rage when attacking the clones, filling up the meter faster, which increases his damage output and healing. Unexpectedly, a third Redditor said that Doctor Strange doesn't gain dark magic when he hits the fake Loki.

Among the Duelists available in the game, the Winter Soldier has a medium difficulty and is characterized by being pure offense, having great damage output, and having crowd control abilities. His pistol, despite having a small magazine, packs quite a punch on the opposing team. But if the player is up to the challenge of playing with other Marvel Rivals Duelists who have a higher learning curve, there are options such as Psylocke, with her high damage and mobility, and Hawkeye with arrows as deadly as bullets, and Spider-Man's incredible mobility.

item.title: Elden Ring: 13 Rarest Weapons In The Game, Ranked
item.description:
Elden Ring is packed with secrets, mysteries, and over 300 unique armaments to slay terrifying bosses. Most of these can be obtained as players progress by killing bosses and exploring the Lands in Between, but FromSoftware is notorious for making it tough to acquire particular weapons. They do this by hiding the weapons behind illusory walls and even decreasing weapon drop rates to as low as 0.5% per kill.

The title is gaining traction once again after the announcement of the DLC, Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree. As such, new players and veterans alike are looking for reasons to jump right back in. Changing up primary weapons in builds is a great way to refresh the gameplay experience, especially with myriad areas to explore and bosses to slay, perhaps once again.

All drop-rate percentages are calculated with 100 points in Item Discovery.

Updated December 26, 2024 by Erik Petrovich : The rarest Elden Ring weapons aren't necessarily the best Elden Ring weapons – they are just the weapons that you are very unlikely to see across a normal playthrough without farming them. But these rarest Elden Ring weapons are still significant in terms of their place in the game's lore, and knowing the context for each weapon's existence makes them feel way more rewarding to get. If you know the Euporia Twinblade is essentially a representation of Miquella's will, for example, it makes sense why it doesn't work on Those Who Live In Death. This guide to the Elden Ring rarest weapons has been updated to provide an abridged version of each item's description, to include the important lore details for the rarest Elden Ring weapons but not their unique effects. Each weapons' unique effect, if applicable, is described in each entry below.

11 The Euporia Twinblade

A Secret Item Found At The End Of The Elden Ring DLC

Twinblade symbolizing abundance. The secret treasure of the tower.

Though the blades, fashioned from golden shoots, are largely wilted and darkened, their luster can be restored by dealing damage to foes.

However, damage dealt to Those Who Live in Death will have no such effect.

  • Weapon Classes : Twinblade
  • Required Stats : STR: 16, DEX: 16, FAITH: 24
  • Weight : 8.5

Though this is not technically one of the rarest Elden Ring weapons, it is rare in that most players have not acquired it. That's because not only is the Euporia Twinblade hidden in an out-of-the-way secret location, its hidden location cannot be found until nearly the end of the Elden Ring DLC. But it's well worth going out of your way for because it happens to also be one of the best Twinblades in the game, thanks in part to its powerful Ash of War.

The Euporia Twinblade scales with Strength, Dexterity, and Faith, and deals a split of Physical and Holy damage (slightly favoring Holy damage). But its Ash of War called Euporia Vortex is what makes this weapon so strong. When used, the Tarnished will raise their blade up, empower it, and then rapidly spin as it comes crashing down to your target. After the weapon is finished spinning, it will fire out some beams of Holy damage, too.

But that's not all – as you continue to attack enemies in rapid succession, the Euporia Vortex skill becomes empowered (unless you attack Those Who Live In Death). If you hit an enemy enough times within about a ten-second-long time frame, you will gain a 5% damage buff and your weapon will start glowing. Then, if you use Euporia Vortex with this buff active, it will last longer, deal more damage, and blast the area with Holy damage in a wide beam.

But if you want to try out this visually impressive and surprisingly hard-hitting Twinblade, you'll have to find it first, and that's a lot easier said than done.

How To Get The Euporia Twinblade

To get the Euporia Twinblade, you have to unlock the Enir-Ilim legacy dungeon after beating Messmer and burning the Sealing Tree. Essentially, to get the Euporia Twinblade, players must go backwards through Enir-Ilim back into Belurat, Tower Settlement until they find an elevator that leads down to its location.

But there are a lot of steps to acquire this extremely hidden Elden Ring weapon. Refer to our guide on How To Get The Euporia Twinblade for specific directions starting from the Spiral Rose Site of Grace in Enir-Ilim to reach the Euporia Twinblade location.

10 Rotten Crystal Spear And Rotten Crystal Staff

Drop Chance: 8%

Spear and Staff fashioned from pure crystal – a deed impossible for a human.

It festers with Scarlet Rot.

  • Weapon Classes : Spear, Glintstone Staff
  • Required Stats : (STR - 10, DEX - 16, INT - 16), (STR - 8, INT - 48)
  • Weight : 5.5, 4.5

As two of the very few weapons that grant the Scarlet Rot status effect as well as magic damage, the Rotten Crystal Spear and Rotten Crystal Staff are prime choices for mages with points invested in Dexterity. While there are far better alternatives in the spear category than the Rotten Crystal Spear, the Rotten Crystal Staff is one of the highest-scaling Glintstone staves in the game and offers an additional 10% boost to Crystalian sorceries.

Sadly, players cannot take advantage of the Scarlet Rot status effect with the Rotten Crystal Staff unless they dole out physical damage with the staff.

How To Get The Rotten Crystal Spear And Rotten Crystal Staff

To get the Rotten Crystal Spear And Rotten Crystal Staff, defeat the various Lesser Crystalian mobs located within Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.

9 Haligtree Crest Greatshield

Drop Chance: 4%

Metal greatshield depicting the Haligtree with unalloyed gold.

Carried by knights who have vowed to serve Miquella's Haligtree.

Yet now, with the Haligtree misshapen, this wondrous rendition is a fleeting fantasy.

  • Weapon Classes : Greatshield
  • Required Stats: STR - 36
  • Weight : 18.5

Although the Haligtree Crest Greatshield has a 4% drop rate at 100 Discovery, which is not that rare compared to others on the list, it is nonetheless one of the most difficult items to get.

Players who strengthen and infuse Haligtree Crest Greatshield will find the final boss, Radagon, a walk in the park, thanks to its high Holy Damage negation. Though it's not a weapon, it's still among the rarest items in Elden Ring , and technically can be used to great effect against many of the endgame bosses.

How To Get The Haligtree Crest Greatshield

To get the Haligtree Crest Greatshield, Players have to reach a single enemy near the Haligtree Roots Site of Grace to acquire this item. Look for the Haligtree Knight standing in a graveyard on its own at the very bottom of the Haligtree area – this single enemy has a 4% chance to drop the shield.

8 Monk's Flameblade

Drop Chance: 4%

Curved sword with a flickering flame motif.

Wielded by the Fire Monks who came from the Mountaintops of the Giants.

The monks came to the land of Liurnia in pursuit of a fugitive who stole their Fire.

  • Weapon Classes : Curved Greatsword
  • Required Stats: STR - 18, DEX - 18
  • Weight : 9

After patch 1.09 dropped, players rushed to try out their favorite Curved Greatswords as FromSoftware decided to buff their range, speed, and other factors. Hence, Monk's Flameblade is the perfect choice for those who want to add a bit of artistic flair to their Curved Greatswords.

It can be infused with Ash of War, which adds more customizability depending on playstyles, making it one of the best-looking and most versatile weapons – if you can get your hands on one.

How To Get The Monk's Flameblade

To get the Monk's Flameblade, you must farm a single Fire Monk in the Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave Site Of Grace

7 Envoy’s Greathorn

Drop Chance: 2%

Fanned golden horn of the Oracle Envoys.

Profoundly weighty, its blows are sure to be felt.

Originally an instrument, but one that cannot be sounded by a mere human.

Or perhaps it is too early to sound the call.

  • Weapon Classes : Colossal Weapon
  • Required Stats: STR - 28, DEX -12, FAI - 24
  • Weight : 19.5

Dropped by the Oracle Envoy Giants, this colossal weapon has a unique Ash of War, the Great Oracular Bubble, which makes up for its poor attack stat. Another great but accessible alternative would be Envoy's Longhorn, which is relatively lighter and has a higher DPS output.

The skill on the Envoy's Greathorn absolutely decimates tanky enemies with relatively smaller hitboxes. Cosplaying Envoys by wearing the Envoy Crown also boosts the base damage.

How To Get The Envoy’s Greathorn

To get the Envoy’s Greathorn, you must farm Envoy enemies inside Leyndell and the Haligtree, specifically the ones who wield this specific version of the weapon. There are three different versions, so use a Telescope if you are unsure of your target.

6 Ripple Crescent Halberd

Drop Chance: 2%

Weapon wielded by young Albinaurics.

The blade is said to resemble a partial image of a ripple.

  • Weapon Classes : Halberd
  • Required Stats: STR - 12, DEX - 12, ARC - 20
  • Weight : 8.5

This weapon is a boon to players with points invested into Arcane as they can potentially apply any status effect to enemies with one hit. Being one of the few items with an "S" rated scaling in Arcane and a lack of default status effects, the Ripple Crescent Halberd can be buffed by using consumables.

In the community, this weapon is notorious for using the Saporific Grease to apply the Sleep status effect on enemies over and over again. However, it can also be used with Blood or Poison greases.

How To Get The Ripple Crescent Halberd

To get the Ripple Crescent Halberd, you must farm Albinauric enemies that wield it, like the ones in the Academy Gate Town area of Liurnia, or in the Palace Ledge-Approach area of Mohgwyn Palace.

5 Guardian's Swordspear

Drop Chance: 2%

Weapon comprising a long handle and broad blade sharpened from the hardwood of old trees.

Wielded by Guardians of the Minor Erdtrees, experts in the art of combat.

  • Weapon Classes : Halberd
  • Required Stats: STR - 17, DEX - 16
  • Weight : 9

Farming this extremely rare Halberd is definitely worth it as it is considered to be the best Halberd in Elden Ring if one has enough points invested into Dexterity. Not only is the Guardian's Swordspear substantially faster when compared to other weapons in its class, but it also outshines its peers when it comes to pure attack rating when paired with the Keen affinity.

Hybrid builds like Dexterity and Faith can also use spells like Bloodflame Blade or even Vyke's Dragonbolt, making it easier to apply status effects to enemies with weak resistances.

How To Get The Guardian's Swordspear

To get the Guardian's Swordspear, players must defeat the six Erdtree Guardians near the Minor Erdtree Church in Altus Plateau, which each have a chance to drop this amazing Halberd.

4 Magma Blade

Drop Chance: 1%

Curved sword with a blade fashioned from the magma of Mt. Gelmir.

An armament of the Man-Serpents, it is impossible for a human to have made.

  • Weapon Classes : Curved Sword
  • Required Stats: STR - 9, DEX - 15, FAI - 16
  • Weight : 4

The glistering appearance of the Magma Blade made quite a name for itself in the Elden Ring community due to its undeniable resemblance to Kratos' Blades of Chaos from God of War . However, an exceptionally low drop rate chance hinders players from attaining two of these weapons for their Kratos cosplay.

Its unique Ash of War scatters loads of magma all-around players while executing up to three slashes. Patch 1.09 also introduced several buffs for this weapon, which include increased running attack speed and decreased recovery time.

How To Get The Magma Blade

To get the Magma Blade, you must kill the Serpent enemies inside of Volcano Manor, specifically the Serpents that are visibly wielding this blade.

3 Cleanrot Spear & Halo Scythe

Drop Chance: 1% / 2%

Spear of the Cleanrot Knights who fought alongside Malenia, Blade of Miquella.

The diminutive shield is blessed with an Incantation that wards off Scarlet Rot.

War Scythe of the Cleanrot Knights who fought alongside Malenia, Blade of Miquella.

This was the weapon of Commanders in Malenia's army.

  • Weapon Classes : Spear, Reaper
  • Required Stats: (STR - 16, DEX - 16, FAI - 14), (STR -13, DEX - 16, FAI - 15)
  • Weight : 5.5, 8.5

The Cleanrot Spear and Halo Scythe remain two of the most popular Faith-scaling weapons in Elden Ring . The Halo Scythe is more popular in the community thanks to its Ash of War, Miquella's Ring of Light, which improves upon the Sacred Ring of Light by considerably increasing its effective range.

This doesn't undermine the Cleanrot Spear though. It also has a unique Ash of War that summons spears from the ground up and deals massive holy damage to enemies who are caught in the area of effect.

How To Get The Cleanrot Spear & Halo Scythe

To get the Cleanrot Spear & Halo Scythe, you must farm Lesser Cleanrot Knights, who roam around the Swamp of Aeonia area of Caelid. These enemies can also be found in the Shaded Castle, though players have found that the ones in Caelid have a higher chance to drop these items.

2 Celebrant’s Cleaver, Celebrant’s Sickle, And Celebrant’s Rib-Rake

Drop Chance: 0.5%

Cleaver, Sickle, and Rake adorned with many colored fabrics.

Ceremonial tools used by dancers during the festivities of Dominula, Windmill Village.

Crafted from human bone.

  • Weapon Classes : Axe, Dagger, Spear.
  • Required Stats: (STR - 12, DEX - 8), (STR - 6, DEX - 11), (STR - 8, DEX - 14)
  • Weight : 4.5, 1.5, 5

This horrifying trio of tools is made from Human bones and can only be found in Dominula, Windmill village, towards the north of Altus Plateau. The trio share unique abilities that grant 10 runes per successful hit and can be infused and buffed by magic or consumables.

These weapons have extremely low drop rates, and it would be a wide idea to boost one's discovery by consuming a Silver Pickled Fowl Foot to get a hold on them.

How To Get The Celebrant’s Cleaver, Celebrant’s Sickle, And Celebrant’s Rib-rake

To get the Celebrant's Cleaver , Celebrant's Sickle , And Celebrant's Rib-Rake , farm the sinister Celebrants who dance around the Windmill Village and surrounding villages. They are typically in groups​​​​​​, so be careful.

1 Noble’s Estoc & Noble’s Slender Sword

Drop Chance: 0.5%

Estoc and narrow Blade carried by Wandering Nobles. Made to be easy to wield.

Daubed with gold from tip to tail, these should fetch a good sum.

  • Weapon Classes : Thrusting Sword, Straight Sword
  • Required Stats: (STR - 9, DEX - 10), (STR - 8, DEX - 11)
  • Weight : 3.5, 3.5

FromSoftware has a reputation for being unpredictable and the very existence of Noble's Estoc and Noble's Slender Sword are proof. However, the exceedingly low chance of receiving these weapons does not excite the average Elden Ring player who looks around for powerful loot.

Weapon-collecting enthusiasts, on the other hand, need to get their hands on this pair of weapons to complete the challenge. These weapons hide in plain sight and can be farmed from arguably the easiest mobs in the game – the Wandering Nobles.

How To Get The Noble’s Estoc & Noble’s Slender Sword

To get the Noble’s Estoc & Noble’s Slender Sword, players should farm the weak Noble enemies that can often be found wandering along roads near Sites of Grace, particularly in Limgrave. A good farm is located in the Mistwood Outskirts site of grace– head directly north to find three Wandering Nobles that will respawn every time you return to the nearby Grace.

More Guides

Honkai: Star Rail may look like a typical turn-based game, but with the gorgeous character design and large areas to explore, it's bound to keep players entertained for hours of gameplay. The combat starts off easy, but will slowly get harder as the game progress, which means it's necessary to properly raise the Trailblazer's party and always keep up with the best equipment.

Here, players can easily access the available Honkai: Star Rail character guides, which include builds, team compositions, Light Cone ranking, and level-up materials. Some tips for harder content like the Simulated Universe are also listed at the bottom section.

This page will constantly be updated with new releases of character guides, so make sure to check back often!

item.title: Roblox: Beast Force Codes (December 2024)
item.description:
Beast Force is an RPG based on the Kaiju No. 8 anime and manga. In it, players will have to fight Beasts using various weapons and abilities. You can even transform into a Beast like the main character of the anime. But to get rare skills, you will need to farm a lot of Beast Cells, which can also be obtained using Beast Force codes.

As expected from Roblox codes, they reward players with useful resources and currencies. Most often they contain valuable Beast Cells, so you do not want to miss them.

All Beast Force Codes

Working Beast Force Codes

  • beastforce - Redeem this code to get 3 Beast Cells
  • no9 - Redeem this code to get 3 Beast Cells
  • 10iscoming - Redeem this code to get 3 Beast Cells
  • opentesting - Redeem this code to get 3 Beast Cells
  • hoshina - Redeem this code to get 3 Beast Cells
  • beastwalker - Redeem this code to get 3 Beast Cells

Expired Beast Force Codes

There are no expired codes in Beast Force . We will update this article as soon as more codes become available.

Once you join Beast Force , you will be given a starting weapon and the ability to evolve into Beast No. 8. With such an arsenal, players will be able to start clearing the Combat Area. However, the further you progress, the more difficult it will be for you to fight. So, you will need to farm Beast Cells, which are the premium currency in the game. They will allow you to reroll your division, which directly affects your abilities. And to speed up this process, you should pay attention to Beast Force codes.

Each code will reward you with Beast Cells, even if you have just started your adventure in Beast Force . So, they are especially useful for new players. However, the codes expire after a certain time after the release, so you should hurry to redeem them while the rewards are still available.

How to Redeem Beast Force Codes

While using Beast Force codes is simple, the option you need is quite hidden compared to other Roblox experiences. However, by following these steps you will be able to claim all the rewards from the developers:

  • Launch Beast Force .
  • Next, click on the Player's Profile button.
  • Select the Redeem option. It is easy to spot by the computer icon.
  • Next, enter the code in the corresponding box.
  • Finally, click on the Redeem button to get the goodies.

How to Get More Beast Force Codes

As with most other Roblox RPGs, the developers release new Beast Force codes on their social media pages. So, you just need to start following them to get all the free goodies first-hand.

  • MustacheDev Roblox group
  • Beast Force Discord server
  • LeePungg - Developer YouTube channel

item.title: Roblox: Gemventure Codes (December 2024)
item.description:
Gemventure is a battleground experience with a rather unusual visual style. As always, you need to fight other players using various combos. But at first, players have access to only two units, as the rest can only be obtained through Gacha. But this requires Spins, which are quite difficult to earn. So, next, we will tell you about Gemventure codes that will help you with this.

These Roblox codes grant players various rewards. But most often they contain Spins needed to summon new units. However, you should remember that the validity period of each code is limited.

All Gemventure Codes

Working Gemventure Codes

  • BASIC - Redeem this code to get 1 Spin

  • VOLUPTAZ

When you first start playing Gemventure , you will have two characters at your disposal that you can switch between right during the battle. At first, they are good enough to get acquainted with the basic mechanics of the game. But to defeat other players, you will need rarer units. In addition, by receiving duplicates, you will be able to upgrade existing characters. So earning Spins is one of your main tasks. And with the help of Gemventure codes, you can earn extra Spins even before you spawn on the map.

Codes contain useful rewards, among which the most valuable are Spins. Using them, you can get new units or duplicates. In any case, they help players progress faster. However, their active period is quite short, so you should hurry.

How to Redeem Gemventure Codes

The code redemption option works as simply as in most other Roblox games. Players don't even need to spawn on the map to do this. Instead, follow these simple steps:

  • First, launch the Gemventure experience.
  • Next, click the Codes button in the main menu.
  • Finally, paste the code and click the Redeem button to claim the reward.

How to Get More Gemventure Codes

Developers release new codes for Gemventure quite often. Usually, this happens after updates or when players reach community milestones. So, to get them as soon as possible, you can bookmark this guide. We will update it over time, like our other Roblox codes articles.

Alternatively, players can start following the developers' official social media. In addition to codes, you will find all the news about upcoming updates, new characters, and events there.
